WARNINGS.WARNINGBODY:
Acetaminophen may cause severe or possibly fatal liver damage if you take
more than the recommended dose in 24 hours
with other drugs containing acetaminophen
while drinking 3 or more alcoholic drinks every day (adult products only) Symptoms of liver damage may include
yellow skin or eyes
dark urine
sweating
nausea
vomiting
stomach pain
unusual tiredness
loss of appetite

Acetaminophen may cause serious skin reactions. Symptoms may include
skin reddening
blisters
rash If any of the above noted symptoms occur, stop use and seek medical help right away.

WARNINGS.WARNINGBODY: In case of overdose, call a Poison Control Centre or get medical help right away. Quick medical attention is critical even if you do not notice any signs or symptoms.
